comment.text: Group Membership is a toggle button that enables or disables group membership for LDAP connections. When clicked, it controls visibility and interaction in the Portal Settings categories integration section.

usage.context:
<div className="group_membership-header">
 <ToggleButton
 className="toggle"
 isChecked={groupMembership}
 onChange={setIsGroupMembership}
 label={t("LdapGroupMembership")}
 isDisabled={!isLdapEnabled || isUIDisabled}
 dataTestId="group_membership_toggle_button"
 />
 <HelpButton
 tooltipContent={t("LdapGroupMembershipTooltip", {

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While "Qrup Üzvlüyü" is a possible translation, it's a bit literal and can sound unnatural. A more natural and idiomatic translation would be "Grup Üyvləri" or "Grup Aüzviyyəti".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using "Grup Üyvləri" or "Grup Aüzviyyəti" for a more natural feel.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While "Associação ao grupo" is understandable, a more accurate and common translation of 'Group Membership' in a technical context like LDAP would be 'Filiação a grupo' or 'Membro do grupo'. "Associação ao grupo" implies a more voluntary or cooperative relationship rather than a technical membership.

While 'Associação ao grupo' is understandable, a more accurate and commonly used translation for 'Group Membership' in a technical context would be 'Filiação ao grupo' or 'Membro do grupo'. 'Associação' implies a more formal or voluntary association.

While "Membrii grupului" is a literal translation of "Group Members," it's not the most natural or idiomatic phrasing in Romanian for the context of LDAP group membership. A more common and contextually appropriate translation would be "Aderarea la grup" or "Apartenența la grup".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using "Aderarea la grup" or "Apartenența la grup".

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Serbian (Cyrillic) translation 'Чланство Групе' translates literally to 'Membership Group'.  A more natural and accurate translation of 'Group Membership' in Serbian would be 'Припадност групи' or 'Чланство у групи'. 'Чланство Групе' sounds awkward.

The translation '组成员资格' (Zu Cheng Yuan Zige) while technically meaning 'membership', doesn't quite capture the nuance of 'Group Membership'. It reads more like 'constituent membership' or 'membership of a component'. 'Group Membership' implies membership *in* a group.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider '群组会员资格' (Qun Zu Hui Yuan Zige) which more directly translates to 'Group Membership' or '团体会员资格' (Tuan Ti Hui Yuan Zige) meaning 'Team Membership'.
